price: Kugira ngo (Allah) azahembe mu ngabire ze ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza. Mu by’ukuri ntakunda abahakanyi.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
